name: Security At Fort Lytton
description:
** Requires HTC Vive to play!

After the last security guard up and left for unknown reasons, you got the job. Its your first shift as a security guard at Fort Lytton! Complete a check of the grounds to make sure everything is in order. 

Controls

Grip button - Teleport

Trigger - Pickup Objects

Touch pad Button - Use Object being held

Created by Marc Love
